attributes.action: Keep mask wear mandatory in all NHS settings, including  GP, Opticians & Dental
attributes.additional_details: Working in primary care we are unable to help our patients if we are ill with Covid. We also see vulnerable and immunocompromised patients. It is unfair to those who have been so careful to stay safe to put them at risk by us coming into contact with patients who don’t have a mask, it will increase the chance of us passing it on to our next patient. We need to maintain the current infection controls and mask wear to protect us and all of our patients and to remain accessible to everyone
attributes.background: With Freedom day approaching, mask wear should still be mandatory in ALL NHS settings for patients and staff. Including Optical dental and care settings. By making mask wear a choice healthcare will become difficult to the most vulnerable

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Continue to make face masks mandatory in all healthcare settings from 19th July.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590820

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
